long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Submit the URL of the current tab to https://glassit.co for price and stock change monitoring when you click the extension button. This browser extension is for Glass It customers who want to avoid copy & paste the URL when requesting monitoring from https://glassit.co. Glass It provides low-cost monitoring across websites and offers a 1-month trial.

Shop normally and submit online items from websites like Amazon, Walmart or Flipkart to Glass It for price tracking without copy & paste. Win gift cards to your favorite stores in the Glass It Price Drop Alerts Sweepstakes!

Glass It Price tracker will monitor prices daily to find deals & discounts. Check price history or get price drop alerts at your favorite stores:

1. Click the Glass It button to submit an online item for price tracking
2. If something goes wrong tracking the price everyday to find deals & discounts, a Web Engineer will fix the issue, or let you know
3. That's it

-Use our price history data to verify you actually got a good deal!
-Set a discount price for the price tracker to look for price drops
-Get email notifications & optional push notifications
-Turn your device off or close the browser. Glass It Price Tracker does not slow your browser or invade your browsing privacy to find deals & discounts, unlike others!
-Price check done for you daily saves time & money
-Works with most products listed for sale online publicly

What youâ€™ll love about Glass It Price Tracker:
-Our Quality of Service
-Customer service. We are humans, not just automated apps. Reach out to us if you feel there is an issue monitoring your product.
-In the Glass It Price Drop Alerts Sweepstakes, you can make money! That's right, free money in the form of gift cards you can win everyday. No purchase required! It's our incentive to you for helping us organize online price history by getting price drop alerts on your device(s). Winner selected everyday. Gift card sent to your email. See official contest rules - https://glassit.co/gift-cards

Track Amazon prices for discounts, but don't forget other websites might also sell the same items! Glass It Price Tracker sends you suggestions for other vendors that sell your items if you have enabled push notifications

Why Glass It Price Tracker is better than others:

1. Price tracker includes tech support for resolving issues
2. Price tracker does not invade your browsing privacy to find discounts
3. Price history data collected by verified users
4. Price drop alerts come with a chance to win gift cards.

To see our privacy statement, please visit https://glassit.co/index.jsp#privacyPolicy
